title.rendered: iPhone Charger Cable, RAVIAD [6ft/1.8m, MFi Certified] Lightning Cable Nylon Braided Charger Lead Fast Charging Cable…

content.rendered:
(*7*)

Apple MFi Certified Lightning Cable

Nylon Braided Apple Charger Lead

  • Premium Unibody Connectors
  • Perfect Length 6FT/ 1.8M

(*8*)

(*6*)

Compatible With

  • iPhone 11 / 11 Pro / 11 Pro Max
  • iPhone XS / XS Max / XR / X
  • iPhone 8 / 8 Plus, iPhone 7 / 7 Plus
  • iPhone 6s / 6s Plus, iPhone 6 / 6 Plus
  • iPhone 5s / 5c / 5 / SE, iPad Air / Air 2 / Pro
  • iPad Pro / iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 3 / mini 4
  • iPod nano seventh gen / iPod contact fifth gen

(*8*)

(*5*)

Built with an unique Apple chip

  • Using Apple’s unique C89 terminal and sensible chip, this MFi-Certified cable is absolutely appropriate with apple gadgets with a 8-pin lightning port, No warning message pops up.

Strong Nylon-braided Cable

  • Nylon fiber fabric jacket encases the Lightning Cable, which make it have glorious anti-twisting & Abrasion-proof property can stand up to not less than 8,000 cycles bend take a look at.

Safer and Faster Charging

  • Enjoy lightning-quick information switch, syncing, and charging. It helps extremely-quick charging (2.4A present), which might be 20% sooner than cables with out the unique Apple chip.

(*8*)
